Class BaseWebServiceSecurity

  • java.lang.Object

      • baseOperationWithPath

        public ResponseFuture baseOperationWithPath(android.content.Context context,
                                   java.lang.String path,
                                   java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> params,
                                    complete,
                                   boolean isSecurityEnabled,
                                   boolean handleErrorCode)
        Calls the given URL with all the additional strings passed as parameters
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        path - the path of the url to call
        params - a map containing all the additional parameters of the call
        complete - callback for the completion of the call
        isSecurityEnabled - true if the WSSE security is enabled for this call, false otherwise
        handleErrorCode - parameter for the error's code management
        Returns:
        the response of the web service

      • baseOperationWithPathGet

        public ResponseFuture baseOperationWithPathGet(android.content.Context context,
                                      java.lang.String path,

                                       complete,
                                      boolean isSecurityEnabled,
                                      boolean handleErrorCode)
        Calls the given URL with all the additional strings passed as parameters, using the GET method
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        path - the path of the url to call
        params - a map containing all the additional parameters of the call
        complete - callback for the completion of the call
        isSecurityEnabled - true if the WSSE security is enabled for this call, false otherwise
        handleErrorCode - parameter for the error's code management
        Returns:
        the response of the web service
